excerpt: "Salesloft, provider of the first and only AI-powered revenue workflow platform, today announced the launch of Rhythm. Powered by a proprietary, patent-pending AI engine called Conductor AI, Rhythm translates buyer behavior into the most immediate and impactful seller actions in a single prioritized workflow customized to each seller."
